title: I made a list of the Dance References in the LoL ... AND IT'S IN ALPHABETICAL ORDER!!! :D
body:
Ahri - Run Devil Run
Ahri (Popstar Skin) - Genie
Akali - Single Ladies
Amumu - Goth Dance
Anivia - Chicken Dance
Ashe - J'en Ai Marre
Azir - Remember the Time
Blitzcrank - Macarena
Blue Sentinel - Open the door
Brand (Zombie Skin) - Thriller
Corki - Do A Barell Roll
Dr.Mundo - Fight The Power
Elise - The Can Can
Evelynn - Tina Tech Dance
Ezreal - Haruhi
Fiddlestick - Scarecrow Dance
Fiora - Putting On the Ritz
Garen - Johnny Bravo's "The Monkey"
Garen (Old Dance) - Bye Bye Bye
Graves - Cowboy Dance
Hecarim - Dope Zebra
Janna - Jazz-Funk Dance

Jayce - MC Hammer Dance
Jinx - Dancing Bug from Adventure Time
Jinx (Mafia Skin) - The Charelston
Kassadin - The Sprinkler
Katarina - Napoleon Dynamite
Kayle - Jump On It
Kayle (Ather wing Skin) - Night Of Fire
Kindred - "Cups" Tap dance
Kog'Maw - Hello, My Baby
Lee Sin - Mighty Steel Legs Style
Lee Sin (Muay Thai Skin) - Tony Jaa Training

Master Yi - Running Man

Master Yi (Old) - Napoleon Dynamite
Morgana - Whirling Dervishes
Nautilus - Peeparoonie Dance
Nasus (old dance) - Walk like an Egyptian
Nasus (Infernal Skin) - Snoop Dogg Dance
Olaf - Techno Viking
Quinn - Are You That Somebody
Pantheon - Jailhouse Rock
Rengar - Maori Haka
Rift Herald - Lim Chang Jung "Open The Door"
Shaco - The Worm
Shaco (Masked Skin) - Talchum
Shen - Tai Chi 24-Form
Shyvana - AKB48 River Dance
Singed - Jump On It
Sion - Chris Farley Chippendales Dance
Sion (old Dance) - Moscow Dance
Soraka - I'm Chiquita Banana
Syndra - Hoot Dance
Talon - Michael Jackson Dance
Teemo - Badgers Dance
Thresh - Poi Dancing
Tristana - US Army Marching Song
Trundle - Danceing Trollface
Tryndamere - Russian Dance
Tryndamere (Old Dance) - Bye Bye Bye
Twisted Fate - Gangnam Style
Udyr - The Drunken Master
Urgot - Kirby's Victory Dance
Vayne - Gun Kata
Vi - The Dougie
Viktor - Shufflin
Vilemaw - The Carlton dance
Vladimir (Blood Lord) - Contact Juggling

Warwick - Thriller
Xerath - Industrial Dance
Xin Zhao - Seung Mina Dance
Yassuo - Shika-no-Tone
Ziggs - Midget Superstar Dance

replies.body: I'm so happy that Amumu's dance is the south park one.
I am severely upset that Ekko's was not the Time Warp.
No Rammus, Lulu, or Poppy. I am sad.

Lulu and Rammus aren't a specific reference. Rammus is just a generic breakdance, Lulu might be referencing something but I think its just free form lulu silliness. Edit- Oh yeah Poppy is the Krunka Lunka dance from Futurama.
Oompa Loompa dance from Willy wonka, futurama parodied the Oompa Loompa dance.
missing reference. dynasty ahri.
Thank you from the bottom of my heart! <3
Current yoric is just him playing his shovel

wait....how do we get access to the Reference dances?  0_o
